eu.gricom.interpreter.basic.variableTypes

Class StringValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.gricom.interpreter.basic.variableTypes.StringValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Expression, Value

    public class StringValue
extends Object
implements Value
    StringValue.java

    Description:

    The StringValue is the container to hold all strings.

    (c) = 2020,.., by Andreas Grimm, Den Haag, The Netherlands
